Module main
Package com.vtuberrush.src.enemies

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
com.vtuberrush.src.enemies.Enemy
Direct Known Subclasses:
SlimeBlue, SlimeGreen, SlimePurple, SlimeRed, SlimeWhite
public abstract class Enemy extends Object
An enemy is a superclass object that moves around the level from a defined start flag to an end flag both faciliated by the EnemyManager and WaveManager.
An enemy interacts with a unit or projectile to recieve damage and debuffs depending on the source.

If an enemy's health is zero, then the player is rewarded an amount of gold depending on the subclass object
If an enemy reaches the end flag, the player is subtracted health and is checked for a game end condition.

Version:
0.0.1-alpha.1
Author:
Gio Carlo Ciudadano

  • Constructor Details

    • Enemy

      public Enemy​(float x, float y, int id, int enemyType, EnemyManager enemyManager)
      Spawns a new enemy at the defined location or where the start flag is located depending on the current wave number and current order of enemies in that wave facilitated by the EnemyManager.

      Sets the health of this enemy upon spawning depending on the enemy type.

      Parameters:
      x - - Defines the horizontal position of where the enemy will spawn or where the start flag is located.
      y - - Defines the vertical position of where the enemy will spawn or where the start flag is located.
      id - - A unique identifier for this enemy.
      enemyType - - Defines the subclass object or type of enemy that will be spawned (e.g. Green Slime, Blue Slime).
      enemyManager - - Facilitates the spawning of this enemy.

  • Method Details

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage​(int damage)
      Reduces the health of this enemy by the passed amount.
      Parameters:
      damage - - The amount of health to be reduced.

    • takeSlow

      public void takeSlow()
      Applies a Slow (Elira) effect to this enemy for 2.5 seconds, reducing its movement speed by 60%.
      Called when a projectile whose source is Elira collides with this enemy.

    • takeBurn

      public void takeBurn()
      Applies a Burn (Selen) effect to this enemy for 4 seconds, reducing its health over time.
      Called when a projectile whose source is Selen collides with this enemy.

    • setChilled

      public void setChilled​(boolean chilled)
      Applies a Chilling (Petra) effect to this enemy while active, reducing its movement speed by 25%.
      Called when this enemy is near Petra.
      Parameters:
      chilled - - Defines if the enemy is currently chilled.

    • takeFrozen

      public void takeFrozen()
      Applies a Frozen (Petra) effect to this enemy for 0.75 seconds, reducing its movement speed by 100%.
      Called when this unit is near Petra and has not recently been frozen in the last 5 seconds.

    • takePurge

      public void takePurge()
      Instantly remove this enemy from the playing field. Called when an enemy collides with an end flag.

    • move

      public void move​(float speed, int directionMove)
      Moves this enemy in the currently set direction by the EnemyManager and in a set speed depending on their enemy type. Adjusts the hitbox of this unit when moving and applies all existing effects to this unit.
      The direction of this enemy changes when colliding with a non-Road tile.
      The speed of this enemy changes if this enemy is currently Slowed (Finana), Chilled, or Frozen (Petra).

      Defaults to the right direction.

      Parameters:
      speed - - The current speed of this enemy. Dependent on existing enemy effects and the enemy type.
      directionMove - - The current direction of this enemy. Changes when colliding with a non-Road tile.
      See Also:
      tickBurn()

    • isAlive

      public boolean isAlive()
      Returns true if this enemy is currently alive.

    • isSlowed

      public boolean isSlowed()
      Returns true if this enemy is currently Slowed (Finana).

    • isBurned

      public boolean isBurned()
      Returns true if this enemy is currently Burning (Selen).

    • isChilled

      public boolean isChilled()
      Returns true if this enemy is currently Chilled (Petra).

    • isFrozen

      public boolean isFrozen()
      Returns true if this enemy is currently Frozen (Petra).

      Returns the horizontal position of this enemy from the left of the window in pixels.

      x

      public float getY()
      Returns the vertical position of this enemy from the top of the window in pixels.
      Returns:
      y

    • getBounds

      public Rectangle getBounds()
      Returns the hitbox of this enemy, defined as four rectangular coordinates (x, y) from the top and left of the window in pixels.
      Called when detecting for projectile collision.
      Returns:
      bounds

    • getHealth

      public int getHealth()
      Returns the current health of this enemy.
      Returns:
      health

    • getHealthPercent

      public float getHealthPercent()
      Returns the current health of this enemy as a percent of its maximum health.
      Called when updating the health bar of this enemy.
      Returns:
      % HP - The amount of percent health this enemy has remaining.

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Returns the unique identifier for this unit, used as a unique identifier for the enemies [Enemy] array list.
      Returns:
      id

    • getEnemyType

      public int getEnemyType()
      Returns the enemy type of this unit.
      Returns:
      enemyType

    • getDirection

      public int getDirection()
      Returns the current direction of this unit.
      Returns:
      direction

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition​(int x, int y)
      Modifies the position of this unit to the passed (x, y) coordinates. Called only when a start flag exists outside a road tile.

      Warning:
      Do not use when dynamically updating the position of all units.

      Parameters:
      x - - Defines the horizontal position of where this enemy is located.
      y - - Defines the vertical position of where this enemy is located.
